snippet.title: LUCID TEASER TRAILER
snippet.description:
LUCID is a heartfelt action/adventure side scrolling platformer with a metroidvania overworld with Zelda like dungeons throughout! You play as Oenn, a young Sentinel tasked with returning balance to a shattered world and fulfilling a solemn promise.

Its a love letter to all the games I played growing up, with modern sensibilities added!

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1717730/LUCID/
